attributes.title: 2015 Audi A5 Cabriolet 2.0 TDI Auto

attributes.description:
White With Dark Grey leather, Full service history at agents (Last service done less than 1 000 km ago) with spare keys, Headlight washers, Front and rear fog lights, 85 Percent left on BF Goodrich all terrain tyres with color codded alloy rims, Light and rain sensors, Factory fitted electric operated tilt and slide sunroof with blind slider, Retractable side mirrors,  Keyless entry, Dual battery system, Factory fitted running boards, Front and rear park distance control with graphic park assist rear view camera, Tow bar with off road trailer electrical coupling, Split tailgate, Extra row seats, Multifunction steering, Centre console fridge, Auxiliary power point, Sunglass holder, SRS Airbags, ABS Brakes, Power steering, ISO Fix, Factory fitted steering operated voice activated touch screen radio with front loader shuttle and DVD, Auto dim mirror, Tip shift gearbox, Power and 2nd drive mode, 6 X Cup holders, Electric windows,mirrors,seats and steering, Steering operated on board computer, 4 High and low range with diff locks, Hill up controlled speed, Hill down decent, Heated front and rear seats, Touch screen maintenance info, Power heat mode, Cruise control, Auxiliary and USB input, Touch screen voice command SAT/NAV, Keyless stop/start, Steering operated voice activated touch screen Bluetooth audio, Touch screen activated front and rear climate control, Dolby digital, Toyota park assist distance select, Touch screen calendar, Anti skid control, Memory driver seat, Roll sensing airbags select, Adjustable headlights, Key operated central locking with alarm/immobilizer.

CONTACT DETAILS:
Phone Cape SUV : 021 982 0334
Niel : 081 408 9188
Martin : 072 246 1367
Visit our website on www.capesuv.co.za

Please confirm dealerships banking details before making a payment to avoid extensive email fraud.
2 Year optional warranty available.
Trade ins welcome.
We are an authorized financial service provider.
This is an authentic advertisement with a reputable dealer. Please be aware of scams by fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay over any deposits unless you have confirmed the details of the vehicle directly with the dealer.
Please note: While every care is taken to avoid mistakes, the dealer cannot accept liability for any errors, misprints or omissions in the printing of an advertisement. Please confirm all facts and features, i.e. leather trim etc with the dealer before making a purchase.
